item.title: Got a problem with ::starter
item.dc:creator: @khisrow khisrow
item.description:
@khisrow wrote:

Hi guys i got a little problem here cause when i log in with new acc and do ::starter it works but when it log out and log in again, i do ::starter again and it works wtf i do there lol

    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
        if (starter == 0) {
            addItem(995, 5000000);
            addItem(392, 1500);
            sendMessage("You Have Started Your Adventure");
            starter = 1;
            savemoreinfo();
            savechar();
        } else if (starter == 1) {
            sendMessage("Sorry.");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                    + " Get the hell of noob make you,r own money :p");

        }
    }

Read full topic
